title: 怎么给1.64的mod的方块加载材质？
author: 人家叫我饼干
txt_content:
MC:1.64
Forge:9.11.1.953
Mcp:8.11
FML:6.4.45.953
怎么给1.64的mod的方块加载材质？

replies.author: 苔石菌
replies.txt_content: Need a mod extension material, have to do is to put files in the material, to see what is your mod

replies.author: 人家叫我饼干
replies.txt_content:
苔石菌 发表于 2014-1-16 13:07 
Need a mod extension material, have to do is to put files in the material, to see what is your mod
Can you give me an example?

replies.author: 苔石菌
replies.txt_content:
人家叫我饼干 发表于 2014-1-16 13:10 
Can you give me an example?
Such as industrial mod, pentagon material has extended

replies.txt_content:

Such as industrial mod, pentagon material has extended
oh,can you speak chinese?

My input method is broken

那你就打个例子让我看看，我不会用。

replies.author: 涂云雷
replies.txt_content: 呃.............哪儿冒出来的外国大神啊？

replies.author: 人家叫我饼干
replies.txt_content:
涂云雷 发表于 2014-1-16 20:39 
呃.............哪儿冒出来的外国大神啊？

replies.author: liehuoyanyike
replies.txt_content:
人家叫我饼干 发表于 2014-1-16 13:00 
急急急急急！！！
public static Item hoeDiamond = (new ItemHoe(37, EnumToolMaterial.EMERALD)).setUnlocalizedName("hoeDiamond").setTextureName("diamond_hoe");

setTextureName("文件夹名:材质名");
item和block使用的方法一样的
文件夹名是你的mod名
在开发目录建立assets/你的mod名/textures/blocks

replies.author: 人家叫我饼干
replies.txt_content:
liehuoyanyike 发表于 2014-1-20 20:30
